In first phase , patient assign take open label sertraline 8 week ( 200 mg/d ) . Those achieved significant decrease PTSD symptoms week 8 enter second phase . In second phase , patient continue sertraline , randomly give either risperidone ( 3 mg/d ) match placebo double-blind fashion .
